K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195a-1: a'arya pra t'i tya sa muta p'a ra da n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195a-3: 'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195a-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195a-7: bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang na /
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195a-8: aar mo ni ga lta bu'i rdo leb la rta
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195a-9: thul la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams dang
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195a-11: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang; lag na
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195a-12: rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195a-13: dpa' chen po yon tan rin po che dpag tu
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195a-14: med pas brgyan pa rnams dang /
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195a-15: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po dang /
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195a-17: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha rnams dang /
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195a-18: lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195a-19: dri za'i rgyal po gtsug phud lnga pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195a-20: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195a-21: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bla
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195a-22: gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195b-0: pa'i lha nga ri rab @195b kyi rtse mo la
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195b-1: btsugs te / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195b-2: logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195b-5: lha 'di dag ni mchod rten bgyid par 'tshal ba sha stag ste /
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195b-7: ci nas tshangs pa'i bsod nams 'phel ba dang /
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195b-10: tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na dge sbyong
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195b-11: dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu las dge slong
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195b-14: dge bsnyen ma dag bsod nams shin tu mang du
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195b-15: 'phel bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bcom ldan
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195b-16: 'das kyis de dag la chos bstan du gsol /
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa /
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195b-18: ye dharm'a he tu pra bha b'a he tunte sh'ana ta th'a ga to hya ba data /
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195b-19: te sh'anytsa yo ni ro dha ae bam b'a d'i ma h'a shra mana /
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195b-20: chos gang rgyu byung de dag gi /
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195b-21: rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa'ang //
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195b-22: de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal te //
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195b-23: dge sbyong chen pos de skad gsungs //
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195b-26: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku yin te /
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:195b-27: sus rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo //
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:196a-1: mdo dad pa can gang la la zhig gis mi
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:196a-2: gnas pa'i phyogs su mchod rten ni skyu ru ra'i
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:196a-3: 'bru tsam / srog shing ni khab tsam /
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:196a-4: gdugs ni ba ku la'i me tog tsam zhig byas la /
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:196a-5: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba chos kyi dbyings kyi
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:196a-6: tshigs su bcad pa nang du bcug na de tshangs
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:196a-7: pa'i bsod nams bskyed par 'gyur te /
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:196a-8: 'di nas shi 'phos shing 'chi ba'i dus byas nas
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:196a-9: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:196a-10: // de nas shi 'phos te 'chi ba'i dus byas
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:196a-11: nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:196a-12: ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:196a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas nyan thos de dag dang /
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:196a-14: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:196a-15: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag /
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:196a-19: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:196a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa mngon par bstod do //
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:196a-21: 'phags pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10D0212=D0520=D0980_H0213:196a-22: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su rendra bo dhi dang /
